text: Insey pehle jo log ho guzre hain woh bhi badi badi chalein chal chuke hain, magar asal faisla-kun chaal to poori ki poori Allah hi ke haath mein hai. Woh jaanta hai ke kaun kya kuch kamayi kar raha hai, aur anqareeb yeh munkireen-e-haqq (disbelievers) dekh lenge ke anjaam kiska ba-khair hota hai
